name: CARcade (Branton Lansdale)
description:
This is my second project in Unity. It is a small racing game with the goal of getting the fastest lap time you can.

W/S - Accelerate/Reverse

A/D - Turning

SHIFT - Handbrake to Drift

I plan on releasing a new version soon. There are multiple cars, like an all -wheel-drive hatchback, and F-1 race car, and a police car, all with their own unique stats and driving styles, however I have not made a selection system to be able to access them yet. Let me know if you beat my Track Record!!!
